label: About Me
content: I am Mohammed Faraz. I'm a graduate of Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) in stream of ECE. I was exposed to the world of coding in my final year project where I handled all the coding part of the project.From then on I learned the skills like React, Node, Express and MongoDB and worked as a Intern in Spark Genie IT Solutions for the past 1 year

label: Skills
content: HTML CSS JavaScript React Node Tailwind MongoDB Bootstrap Express

label: Work Experience
content: For the past 1 Year I worked at Spark Genie IT Solution as Freelance MERN Stack Developer. There I mainly worked on Frontend and React.

label: Passion
content: I am passionate about cricket and coding.

label: Academic Background
content: I completed my Graduation in BE(ECE) from ISL Engineering College with 7.3 GPA.
